data.title: DevOps Engineer
data.description: Responsible for overseeing the code releases, combining an understanding of both engineering and coding. DevOps engineers work with various departments to create and develop systems within a company.

data.title: Platform Engineer
data.description: Innovates and builds the underlying systems that power application development and deployment. Focuses on optimizing platform performance and scalability.

data.title: Cloudops Engineer
data.description: Manages cloud infrastructure and services, ensuring smooth deployment, support, and monitoring of cloud environments. Works on automating cloud operations and optimizing costs.

data.title: Site Reliability Engineer
data.description: Works to create a bridge between development and IT operations, focusing on creating scalable and highly reliable software systems. Monitors system performance and ensures service availability.

data.title: Cloud Native Application Engineer - Backend
data.description: Responsible for overseeing the code releases, combining an understanding of both engineering and coding. DevOps engineers work with various departments to create and develop systems within a company.

data.title: Cloud Native Application Engineer - Front End
data.description: Innovates and builds the underlying systems that power application development and deployment. Focuses on optimizing platform performance and scalability.

data.title: LCNC Platform Engineer
data.description: Manages cloud infrastructure and services, ensuring smooth deployment, support, and monitoring of cloud environments. Works on automating cloud operations and optimizing costs.

data.title: Integration Engineer
data.description: Works to create a bridge between development and IT operations, focusing on creating scalable and highly reliable software systems. Monitors system performance and ensures service availability.

data.title: Data Engineer
data.description: Designing and implementing ETL processes and data pipelines for analytics, requiring expertise in SQL, Python, , PySpark, any ETL and cloud technologies

data.title: Data - BI Visualization Engineer
data.description: Creates interactive dashboards and reports using BI tools, turning data into actionable insights. Optimizes data models, ensures data accuracy, and collaborates with stakeholders to meet business needs

data.title: Data Modeller
data.description: Designs and maintains data models that define the structure and relationships of organizational data to support analytics and business processes. Collaborates with data engineers and stakeholders to ensure data quality, integration, and adherence to modelling standards.

data.title: Data Analyst
data.description: Interprets complex data sets to provide insights that drive business decisions. Collects, processes, and analyses data using statistical tools, creating reports and visualizations to communicate findings effectively to stakeholders.
